title: 3D Face Hallucination from a Single Depth Frame
excerpt: Abstract We present an algorithm that takes a single frame of a person's face from a depth camera, eg, Kinect, and produces a high-resolution 3D mesh of the input face. We leverage a dataset of 3D face meshes of 1204 distinct individuals ranging from age 3 to 40,  ...
